title: MegaBundleMusicPack
description: More than 11 hours of high-quality sound, 7 gigabytes of music, 127 tracks in a variety of styles.
longDescription:
Do you need a lot of music for your project? Maybe you would like to create an open world with your radio stations? Or a musical \ dance battle? In any case, if you need a lot of music for your project, MegaBundleMusicPack is exactly what you are looking for! 127 tracks in a variety of styles - breakbeat, big beat, progressive trance,uplifnig trance, progressive house, deep house, electro punk, hard rock, chill out ...

More than 11 hours of high-quality sound, 7 gigabytes of music from V.G., also known as Betelgeuze, Devil Dragon Tatoo or Alin.

MegaBundleSoundPack, contains in itself such packs as:

Break Beat Mega

Cinematic Soundtracks

Trance Music vol.1

Trance Music vol.2

Dream Music vol.1

Dream Music vol.2

Hard Rock Soundtracks

Buying this pack, you save more than 50 dollars than buying them separately.
